title: 3 and Out - NFL's Non-Bubble Works; Toxic Earl Thomas; Anti-Trey Lance Showcase;  Jags Ngakoue Incompetence; Conference Winner Bets; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL's Non-Bubble Works; Toxic Earl Thomas; Anti-Trey Lance Showcase;  Jags Ngakoue Incompetence; Conference Winner Bets; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John looks at why the NFL can work despite not being in a 'bubble', why Earl thomas has become more of a headache than he's worth, why he thinks North Dakota State top QB prospect Trey Lance should pass on a one game showcase, why the Jags handling of the Yannick Ngakoue situation is just the latest sign of their incompetence.

He also gives his best bets for conference winners, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
